overview: this is asleep country, so it seems to have truly been for a 100 days in your time and life. it's always there when the need is most or least. days of constants, days you have to make up. go now, to a 100% of your life.
tagline: you don't have to be [adjective], today or tomorrow. you have [numeral] days that you still haven't lived. you are not yet [noun], or [noun], or better yet [noun] we are in asleep country.
title: Asleep Country
